comments.body: Use this queryhttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/addresses?q=balance(100000000000..)#The number 100000000000 is for satoshi unit that equals 1,000 bitcoin. You can edit it to any number you want for your query.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Even if there was a tool, it would be a useless stat because there are people who keep using the same address as the change address, so the total amount of bitcoin received in the address becomes inflated and inaccurate. For exampleAddress A receives 200 BTC but then spends only 50BTC to address B, if the wallet has no change addresses enabled, the change 150 BTC returns to address ACode:[Input] Address A 200 BTC ------------------------> [Output] Address B 50 BTC                                 |                                 -----------------> [Output] Address A 150 BTC (change address)According to block explorers I know, it now appears as though Address A has received a total 350 BTCCompare with an address that has a different change addressCode:[Input] Address A 200 BTC ------------------------> [Output] Address B 50 BTC                                 |                                 -----------------> [Output] Address C 150 BTC (change address)
